howTo.title: Hi! I'm Caio (pronounced 'Kai-oh'), a software engineer based in Brooklyn, NY. I grew up with adventurous parents who raised me in countries across Europe, Asia, South America, and Polynesia. After turning 18 I made way to Sao Paulo, Brazil where I became an entrepreneur providing language learning services to corporate clients using the immersive techniques I used to learn languages while growing up abroad. Thereafter, I made my way back to the U.S. and worked in Portuguese and French translation and volunteered for refugee resettlement.

My programming journey over the past year has included extensive study with MIT OpenCourseware, attending Hack Reactor, and participating in several hackathons. My emphasis is on product design and UX/UI. I keep an eye for detail with all of the work I do.
